text: Divorce retracted dva krat! divorced zensky allowed zit v same domov amicably lavy it amicably! Nie bol lawful muz berie anything he dat ju. couple fear ze they transgress GOD's zakon. there bol fear they transgress GOD's zakon they commit nie omyl manzelka willingly dat whatever ona zvolit si These je GOD's zakon; nie transgress them! Those transgress GOD's zakon bol the unjust
